keel.Algorithms.UnsupervisedLearning.AssociationRules.IntervalRuleLearning.GAR

Class GARProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.UnsupervisedLearning.AssociationRules.IntervalRuleLearning.GAR.GARProcess

  • public class GARProcess
extends java.lang.Object

    It provides the implementation of the GAR algorithm to be run in a process

    Since:
    JDK1.6

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Alberto Fernández, Modified by Diana Martín (dmartin@ceis.cujae.edu.cu)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        It runs the algorithm for mining association rules.

      • printReport

        public void printReport(double minConfidence,
                        double minSupport)

        It prints out on screen relevant information regarding the mined association rules which have their confidence and support values higher than the minimum ones given.

        Parameters:
        minConfidence - given minimum confidence value.
        minSupport - given minimum support value.

      • printRules

        public java.lang.String printRules(java.util.ArrayList<AssociationRule> rules)

        Returns a String with relevant information regarding the mined association rules

        Parameters:
        rules - The array of association rules from which gathering relevant information
        Returns:
        String with relevant information regarding the mined association rules

      • saveReport

        public void saveReport(double minConfidence,
                       double minSupport,
                       java.io.PrintWriter w)

        It prints out on the given PrintWriter object relevant information regarding the mined association rules. These rules must have their confidence and support values higher than the minimum ones given.

        Parameters:
        minConfidence - minimum confidence value given.
        minSupport - minimum support value given.
        w - given PrintWriter object to write on.

      • roundDouble

        public static double roundDouble(double number,
                                 int decimalPlace)
        Rounds the number applying the BigDecimal rounding mode given.
        Parameters:
        number - number to be rounded.
        decimalPlace - given rounding mode.
        Returns:
        the rounded number.

      • getSetRules

        public java.util.ArrayList<AssociationRule> getSetRules(double minConfidence,
                                                        double minSupport)
        Returns the rules that have their confidence and support values higher than the minimum ones given.
        Parameters:
        minConfidence - minimum confidence value given.
        minSupport - minimum support value given.
        Returns:
        the rules that have their confidence and support values higher than the minimum ones given.
